scripts.build:all: bun run build:core && bun run build:react && bun run build:solid
scripts.version:core:patch: cd packages/core && bun pm version patch
scripts.version:core:minor: cd packages/core && bun pm version minor

scripts.version:react:minor: cd packages/react && bun pm version minor
scripts.version:solid:patch: cd packages/solid && bun pm version patch
scripts.version:solid:minor: cd packages/solid && bun pm version minor
